AAKNDDKKADC: During <color=#F39000>Dragonspine Special Training</color>, you can obtain various Snowman Components.\nAfter obtaining Snowman Components, you can use them to make Puffy Snowmen in your camp.\nOnce you have completed several Puffy Snowmen, you will obtain the corresponding rewards.
JCJBKMMAADE: Complete "Shadows Amidst Snowstorms: Act I" to unlock
